snippet.title: Pet boom in Mexico amid rising middle class
snippet.description: Camila celebrated her first birthday in a blue-and-white striped dress with tulle appliques, playing with her guests in a room decorated with pink balloons, lilacs and Hello Kitty posters.

snippet.title: Move over, Tupperware — home sales parties have gotten hipper and higher end.
snippet.description: All this "come over and see my stuff" can add up to big bucks: Direct-selling companies netted $31 billion in U.S. sales in 2012.

snippet.title: Montgomery County community events, March 6 -13, 2014
snippet.description: Washington Jewish Film Festival, Dance Bethesda fest, Run, Sweat & Beers Pub Run and other events

snippet.title: In Virginia's Northern Neck, the Kilmarnock Inn has presidential aspirations
snippet.description: The Virginia bed-and-breakfast mixes history and recreation in a charming setting.

snippet.title: Two bistros on Capitol Hill: A newcomer with a meaty focus and an old-timer with a fresh look
snippet.description: Refurbished Bistro Bis could learn something about cooking from an exuberant newcomer, Béarnaise.

snippet.title: A critic's picks on the top-notch San Francisco restaurant scene
snippet.description: Our restaurant critic chooses his favorites among San Francisco's many excellent restaurants.

snippet.title: Southern Maryland community calendar, Feb. 6-13, 2014
snippet.description: Events include all-you-can eat breakfast, tech expo, African American genealogy and more.

snippet.title: D.C. community calendar, Aug. 1 to 8, 2013
snippet.description: Summer library programs for children and teens, piano festival, Ranger-led bike and walking tours, concerts.

snippet.title: Hospital surgery recovery: How food deliveries from family and friends got me through
snippet.description: Food from friends played a key role in my recovery from hip replacement surgery.
